markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Triton's Conch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=269)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 576 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 640 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

If you put this large opalescent conch shell to your ear, you can hear the sound of the roaring sea crashing against the shore.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact ([auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16))    **Effect**  You can raise the conch to your lips and blow into it, letting out a long, rumbling note. For the next minute, you and all allies who were within 30 feet of you when you activated the conch gain a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks to Swim and can breathe under water.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Triton's Conch

Activate Single Action Interact (auditory) Effect You can raise the conch to your lips and blow into it, letting out a long, rumbling note. For the next minute, you and all allies who were within 30 feet of you when you activated the conch gain a +2 item bonus to Athletics checks to Swim and can breathe under water.
